title: I Cover the Waterfront
brief_description: A reporter uses a girl’s friendship to expose her father’s smuggling activities. “I Cover the Waterfront” is a tough and daring melodrama about organised crime and the brave men who try to expose it. Stars Claudette Colbert. Rated: G
